si.title: SLCFA commends China’s generous support for flood relief efforts in Sri Lanka
body_lines: අර්බුදකාරී කාලවලදී ශ්රී ලංකාවේ ජනතාවට උපකාර කිරීම සඳහා ශ්රී ලංකා-චීන මිත්රත්ව සංගමය (SLCFA) නැවත වරක් ශ්රී ලංකාවේ ජනතාවට සහාය වීම සඳහා යළිත් වරක් චීන සමූහාණ්ඩුව නැවත වරක් ඉදිරිපත් විය.

“On 22 October, Ambassador Qi Zhenhong, representing the Chinese Government, handed over Rs. හදිසි මානුෂීය හානිකර අරමුදල්වලින් මිලියන 30 ක් ජනාධිපති අනුර කුමාර දිසානායක වෙත. මෑතදී ඇති වූ ගංවතුරෙන් පීඩාවට පත් වූවන්ට මෙම ත්යාගශීලී පරිත්යාගය අත්යවශ්ය සහයෝගයක් ලබා දෙන අතර ඔවුන්ගේ නිවාස නැවත ගොඩනැඟීමට ඔවුන්ට සහාය වීම. "

"චීන රජය සහ චීනයේ ජනතාව දුෂ්කර කාලවලදී ශ්රී ලංකාව විසින් ශ්රී ලංකාව විසින් නැගී සිටීමට නොසැලෙන කැපවීම නිරන්තරයෙන් පෙන්නුම් කර ඇත. Be it floods, droughts, the COVID-19 pandemic, or shortages of critical medicines, China has extended its friendship, treating the people of Sri Lanka with care and compassion, as if they were their own.

In the aftermath of these devastating floods, China was the first country to provide substantial relief funds, underscoring the deep bonds of solidarity between the two nations. The SLCFA expresses its profound appreciation to President Xi Jinping, the Communist Party of China, the Chinese Government, and the Embassy of China in Sri Lanka for their swift and generous response to the crisis.”

“As we face these challenging circumstances, we are confident that, under the leadership of President Anura Kumara Dissanayake, Sri Lanka will recover and emerge stronger. අන්යෝන්ය ගෞරවය හා හවුල් ඉතිහාසය තුළ මුල් බැසගත් ශ්රී ලංකාව සහ චීනය අතර ඇති මිත්රත්වය අපගේ ජාතියට අඛණ්ඩව ශක්තියක් ලෙස පවතී.

The SLCFA acknowledges China’s invaluable contributions not only during this flood disaster but also in other critical moments. From providing life-saving assistance during the COVID-19 pandemic to supporting us through periods of drought and medicine shortages, China’s commitment to the welfare of Sri Lanka has been unwavering.

On behalf of the people of Sri Lanka, we extend our deepest gratitude to the Government and people of China for their continued support. The close ties between our nations, fortified by China’s consistent help during our most difficult times, remind us of the enduring bond of friendship and cooperation that we cherish.”

ta.title: இலங்கையில் வெள்ள நிவாரண முயற்சிகளுக்கு சீனாவின் தாராள ஆதரவைப் பாராட்டுகிறது
body_lines: இலங்கை-சீனா நட்பு சங்கம் (எஸ்.எல்.சி.எஃப்.ஏ) அதன் ஆழ்ந்த பாராட்டுகளை மக்கள் சீன குடியரசிற்கு நீட்டித்தது, நெருக்கடி காலங்களில் இலங்கை மக்களுக்கு உதவ மீண்டும் முன்வந்தது.

“On 22 October, Ambassador Qi Zhenhong, representing the Chinese Government, handed over Rs. ஜனாதிபதி அனுரா குமாரா டிசனாயக்குக்கு 30 மில்லியன் அவசரகால மனிதாபிமான நிவாரண நிதிகள். This generous donation will provide essential support to those affected by the recent floods, aiding their recovery and helping them rebuild their homes.”

“The Chinese Government and the people of China have consistently demonstrated their unwavering commitment to standing by Sri Lanka during difficult times. Be it floods, droughts, the COVID-19 pandemic, or shortages of critical medicines, China has extended its friendship, treating the people of Sri Lanka with care and compassion, as if they were their own.

இந்த பேரழிவு தரும் வெள்ளத்தின் பின்னர், கணிசமான நிவாரண நிதிகளை வழங்கிய முதல் நாடு சீனா, இரு நாடுகளுக்கிடையேயான ஒற்றுமையின் ஆழமான பிணைப்புகளை அடிக்கோடிட்டுக் காட்டுகிறது. The SLCFA expresses its profound appreciation to President Xi Jinping, the Communist Party of China, the Chinese Government, and the Embassy of China in Sri Lanka for their swift and generous response to the crisis.”

“As we face these challenging circumstances, we are confident that, under the leadership of President Anura Kumara Dissanayake, Sri Lanka will recover and emerge stronger. The enduring friendship between Sri Lanka and China, rooted in mutual respect and shared history, continues to be a source of strength for our nation.

The SLCFA acknowledges China’s invaluable contributions not only during this flood disaster but also in other critical moments. From providing life-saving assistance during the COVID-19 pandemic to supporting us through periods of drought and medicine shortages, China’s commitment to the welfare of Sri Lanka has been unwavering.

On behalf of the people of Sri Lanka, we extend our deepest gratitude to the Government and people of China for their continued support. எங்கள் நாடுகளுக்கு இடையிலான நெருங்கிய உறவுகள், எங்கள் மிகவும் கடினமான காலங்களில் சீனாவின் நிலையான உதவியால் பலப்படுத்தப்படுகின்றன, நட்பு மற்றும் ஒத்துழைப்பின் நீடித்த பிணைப்பு மற்றும் நாங்கள் மதிக்கும் ஒத்துழைப்பை நமக்கு நினைவூட்டுகிறது. ”
